hello I'm Karim a cloud support engineer
here at the AWS office in Dublin today
I'm going to demonstrate how to install
a software package from the extra
library on an Amazon elastic compute
Cloud Amazon ec2 instance running Amazon
Linux 2 let's get started before we
start make sure that the Amazon Linux
extra repository is installed on the ec2
instance note that the steps provided in
this video are valid only for Amazon
Linux 2 these steps don't apply to
Amazon Linux 1 or Amazon Linux 2023 l in
to the instance through SSH SSM session
manager or easy to connect let's first
confirm that the instance is running the
Amazon Linux 2 OS by running this
command after you verify the
distribution confirm that Amazon Linux
extra package is installed to do this
run this
command if the output does not return
the Amazon Linux extra package go ahead
and install it using the package manager
yam since the package is already
installed the output shows nothing to
do next list to variable topics using
the command Amazon Linux extra the
topics are dynamically
updated after identifying the topic that
you want enable it using this command
here I'm activating the PHP 8.2 topic
using this command from the command
output you can see that the topic PHP
8.2 is now
enabled now go ahead and install the
desired packages from the enabled
library in this example I'm installing
the PHP
packages finally you can enter the yam
Leist command to confirm the software
version here I'm filtering the output to
highlight the PHP packages using the
grap
command so now you know how to install a
software package in the extra library on
an ec2 instance running Amazon Linux 2
thanks for watching and Happy Cloud
Computing from all of us here at
